nodes.text: RB-551 was an older model of B1-series battle droid that was controlled by a central computer rather than being a free-thinking droid such as newer models. He served the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Battle of Ryloth. His head was discovered by a droid patrol on the flatlands of Cazne, where he, along with other battle droids was destroyed by the Twi'lek Resistance.
